definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: grandfather of Ahitub and great-grandfather of Zadok 1Ch 5:32, 1Ch 5:33, 1Ch 6:37, Ezr 7:3; LXX Mareihl, Marerwq, Maraiwq, etc.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as son of Ahitub and father of Zadok 1Ch 9:11, Ne 11:11; LXX Marmwq Mar(a)iwq.
name of a priestly house Ne 12:15 (prob. err. for [[מְרֵמוֹת]], q. v., Ne 12:3), LXXL Marimwq.
